thread.section_title: The Surrey - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, Luxury, Superior Hospitality
thread.title_full: Location, Luxury, Superior Hospitality - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: William H
title: Location, Luxury, Superior Hospitality
text: If you're interested in staying on the Upper East Side, this time-tested and friendly boutique hotel is worth your consideration. Priced reasonably in comparison to the competition, it offers a practical, interesting and convenient location--plus a staff so friendly and helpful you will feel right at home. Within two blocks of the hotel you will find Central Park, fine dining, musical entertainment, an elegant brunch/breakfast spot, a diner for a reliable every day breakfast, and a good neighborhood Italian restaurant--and I am sure there are more features that I didn't discover. Oh yes--the rooms have comfortable, quality furnishings and are quiet for a good night's sleep. Check it out.
